EmailTemplate.subject: Up to 60% off A320 and B737 Parts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=hat_a320_a737]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Based on your previous order history, we think you’ll be interested in this sale.
Honeywell Aerospace Trading (HAT) has dropped the price EVEN FURTHER on hundreds of A320 and 737 parts—and the parts are clearing out fast. Visit HAT’s sleek, modern electronic storefront on GoDirect™ Trade – where you can search for parts and have full access to price, product images and quality documents.
Happy Shopping,
GO TO GODIRECT TRADE <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=hat_a320_a737]]>
